mapper.select:
select
from yyzj_c_rule
order by ${orderByClause}
limit 1
SELECT MAX(r.rule_id) ruleId FROM yyzj_c_rule r

SELECT b.rule_id, b.`name`, b.info FROM yyzj_c_rule_to_type a LEFT JOIN yyzj_c_rule b ON b.rule_id = a.rule_id WHERE 1=1 AND a.rule_type_id IN(SELECT c.rule_type_id FROM yyzj_c_rule_type c WHERE c.parent_id = #{ruleTypeId} OR c.rule_type_id = #{ruleTypeId})
AND b.`name` LIKE CONCAT("%",#{name},"%")
